amendment.description: To provide that nothing in the resolution shall be construed as an authorization for the use of force or a declaration of war.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3993 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3993 proposed by Senator Schatz for Senator Coons. (consideration: CR S6463; text: CR S6463) To provide that nothing in the resolution shall be construed as an authorization for the use of force or a declaration of war.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3993 proposed by Senator Schatz for Senator Coons.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3993 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
